name: Checkout Latency Spike
description: p95 latency increased 4x after a payment SDK update deploy

incident.description: p95 latency spike above 500ms on checkout service

ground_truth.root_cause: Memory leak in payment SDK v3.0 causing connection pool exhaustion
ground_truth.correct_mitigation: Roll back checkout service to v2.3.0
key_evidence: Latency increase started exactly at 10:00 when deploy completed
Error logs show connection timeout to payment service
Recent deploy updated payment SDK from v2.x to v3.0
No other services affected, isolating issue to checkout

must_identify: correlation between deploy time and latency increase
acceptable_mitigations: restart pods to temporarily clear connections
